sectionTitles.topics: You can bring these into coaching

seo.title: Coaching for mid-career returners | SustainSage
seo.description: Support for professionals returning after a career break or relocation—regain momentum without ignoring capacity.

hero.title: For mid-career returners
hero.subtitle: You’ve done this before, yet the landscape changed. Let’s rebuild momentum with care.

challenges: You’re re-entering work after caregiving, illness or relocation and feel both eager and rusty.
Job descriptions and expectations look different from the last time you searched.
Your network shifted; you’re unsure who to update or how to ask for support.
Family logistics compete with the focus you want for your professional goals.
topics: Designing a phased return that protects energy and finances.
Reframing your story so gaps feel honest, not apologetic.
Negotiating boundaries at home and work without guilt.
Testing small experiments before committing to a full-time leap.

partnership.title: Packages we often recommend
partnership.description: Each link opens a detailed page with who it suits, session flow and boundaries.

items.title: Transition package
items.summary: Stabilise the first 3–4 months of your return with structured reflection.

items.title: Reset package
items.summary: Short arc to rebuild routines if energy feels fragmented.

boundaries.title: What this page is not promising
boundaries.intro: We stay within coaching and honest partnership.
items: No guaranteed job offers or fast-tracked promotions.
No done-for-you CV writing or recruiter outreach.
No replacement for therapy if trauma or burnout needs clinical care.

case.title: Composite snapshot
case.summary: After a 3-year care break, a programme manager used Transition to script conversations with a new employer, design childcare contingency plans and rehearse confidence for stakeholder meetings. They returned at 4 days per week with a reviewed workload agreement.

cta.body: Curious how this could look for you? Book a 20-minute chat and we’ll explore pace, scope and readiness together.

seo.title: Coaching for newcomers to the UK | SustainSage
seo.description: Navigate UK life and work transitions with culturally aware coaching—no assimilation pressure, just honest partnership.

hero.title: For newcomers to the UK
hero.subtitle: You’re building a life here while honouring who you were before. Coaching can hold the nuance.
hero.imageAlt: Newcomers to the UK finding footing

challenges: Visas, housing and bank accounts leave little space to feel settled.
Workplace norms and communication styles are still unfamiliar.
You’re translating yourself between languages or cultures all day.
Loved ones abroad expect quick success; you need steadier pace.
topics: Mapping practical next steps alongside emotional processing.
Designing experiments to test networks, job search or community options.
Naming the grief, loneliness or frustration that polite conversations skip.
Advocating for fair treatment without burning bridges.

items.title: Transition package
items.summary: Hold space for the administrative and emotional weight of relocating.

items.title: Reset package
items.summary: If you are already here but overwhelmed, Reset helps you rebuild steady habits.

boundaries.title: What this space is not
items: Not immigration advice or legal representation.
Not job placement or landlord negotiation on your behalf.
Not therapy for trauma or acute mental health support.

case.title: Composite snapshot
case.summary: A product designer moved from Taipei to Manchester. Through Transition we planned a values-based job search, translated accomplishments into UK-friendly language and created rituals to stay connected with family across time zones. They accepted an offer that matched their capacity and boundaries.

cta.body: Bring your questions to a 20-minute chat—we’ll check scope, timing and whether coaching is the best next step.

seo.title: Coaching for parents returning to work | SustainSage
seo.description: Navigate caregiving, workload and identity with coaching that respects your boundaries and pace.

hero.title: For parents returning to work
hero.subtitle: You’re balancing care, career and a new sense of self. Coaching offers a steady thinking space.

challenges: Childcare logistics and backup plans keep shifting.
You’re negotiating flexible arrangements while doubting if it’s allowed.
Guilt, resentment and love show up in the same hour.
You want to lead well without pretending capacity is unlimited.
topics: Setting consent-based boundaries with partners, managers and extended family.
Designing recovery time that fits nap schedules or school runs.
Advocating for flexibility without apologising for care roles.
Rebuilding confidence in your professional judgment after time away.

items.title: Reset package
items.summary: Short arc to rebuild your routine and energy after parental leave.

items.title: Deepening package
items.summary: For leaders juggling care and influence who want longer-term support.

boundaries.title: What we will not do
items: Not guarantee specific childcare solutions or employer outcomes.
Not replace therapy, medical or financial advice.
Not pressure you into hustle narratives or perfect-parent myths.

case.title: Composite snapshot
case.summary: A senior analyst returning after adoption leave felt torn between visibility and family needs. Through Reset then Deepening we mapped non-negotiables, rehearsed boundary conversations and designed shared calendars with their partner. Six months later they reported sustainable energy and clear agreements at work.

cta.body: Let’s talk about what support would feel sustainable. Start with a 20-minute chat or review the service pathways.
